creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: three men in foreground, seen from back; man at left wears plaid short-sleeved shirt and watch on PR wrist; central man wears striped jacket and looks through camera; standing man at right with bushy hair wears checked shirt, vest and jeans; bare-breasted woman with short hair at center in front of white wall nurses a baby
marks: Signature and Date on back, in pencil: [R Levin \'81]
title: Andy Warhol at a Photo Shoot
